Reviews.Title: It's a great bundle but...
Reviews.Author: Michelle Hart
Reviews.Content: The tripod is very weak. Once the 55-250mm lens or anything else is attached, the tripod becomes VERY wobbly. It's handle has already broken on me and I haven't even had it no more than a month.

Reviews.Title: Oh my gosh!
Reviews.Author: Allison "Allison"
Reviews.Content: this camera takes awesome pictures.  the detail of the pictures is unbelieveable! the package is great for the price!  Love it!!!

Reviews.Title: T3i
Reviews.Author: Daniel Wilczewski
Reviews.Content: The T3i takes great pictures and does not break the bank. It is so easy to use and the  IS lenses are awesome.

Reviews.Title: nice camrea
Reviews.Author: erik thom
Reviews.Content: I bought this before I had my first born baby nice camera much more then I needed but who cares should be more then I need for a long time

Reviews.Title: wonderful
Reviews.Author: Dawn Darley
Reviews.Content: I am inept with the use of the camera but have been dabbling and hope soon to have more time to dabble more.

Reviews.Title: All was as promised and take great pictures
Reviews.Author: Mikki
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, easy to use ,all the bells and whistles I .I Love it!I would recommend this to anyone

Reviews.Title: Great price, decent package
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Camera is great, but there are reviews of that everywhere.  As in any composite package, it is mixed.  The alternate fixed lenses are of limited use.  SD card is great, SD card/USB holder works great.  Love the backpack case -just right for traveling around with room for other stuff when site seeing.  Ideally, would ditch the extra fixed lenses and get a flash.  But still an amazing deal!!!Retailer is great.  Ordered it just after Hurricane Sandy and it came very fast.

Reviews.Title: Recomendado 100%
Reviews.Author: Ernesto Freites
Reviews.Content: Muy responsables y llego a tiempo el paquete.Gracias llego todo en muy buenas condiciones a venezuela y a tiempo.
